## ReadableEthersLiquity.getHLQTYStake() method

Get the current state of an HLQTY Stake.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getHLQTYStake(address?: string, overrides?: EthersCallOverrides): Promise<HLQTYStake>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
